question: When a bill is reserved by the governor for the consideration of the President which of the following options are available to the President?
option1: Give his assent to the bill
option2: Withhold his assent to the bill
option3: Return the bill for reconsideration of the House or Houses of the state legislature
explanation: When a bill is reserved by the governor of the state for the consideration of the President of India, the President may either give his assent to the bill or withhold his assent to the bill or return the bill for reconsideration of the House or Houses of the state legislature.
